amendment.description: To provide additional funding for Impact Aid programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1617 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1617 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11297; text: CR S11297) To provide additional funding for Impact Aid programs.
